detail_desc: T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10.5 cm.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in soft twill with elastication at the back of the waist. Loose fit with a fake fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts in printed cotton jersey. The shorts have an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and a raw-edge hem.
Desert boots in imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a padded tongue with an appliqué. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Short dress in a soft patterned weave with a lace trim around the neckline and opening with twisted ties at the top. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Pattern-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a small, frilled collar, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, and short raglan sleeves. Seam at the waist, and a seam with a flounced trim on the sleeves and at the hem. Unlined.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a text motif down the sleeves. Double-layered, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem that creates a boxy look.
Cap in a cotton weave with a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.
Calf-length trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons. Unlined.

Imitation suede sandals with straps over the foot, a heel strap and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.

Jacket in a soft weave with a concealed double-breasted press-stud fastening at the front. Hood with a detachable faux fur trim, pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.
Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Strapless maxi dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Integral top with elastication at the top.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, a pair of corduroy shorts and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back. Shorts with a fake fly, decorative button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing LED lights in various colours.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-on fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of trousers and a hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a ribbed hem.

Short-sleeved shirt woven in a patterned cotton blend with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Microfibre body with a gently sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and seat. Non-wired, mesh-lined lace cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and glued hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with press-studs.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Hoodie with a kangaroo pockets a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Short-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton pointelle jersey with a V-neck and button placket. Decorative picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with stripes in different stitches and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Hi-top trainers in glittery and shimmering imitation leather with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and patterned soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave with elastication and a frill trim at the waist, side pockets with a small frill trim and wide straight legs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a belt with metal rings at the side. Pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Padded earmuffs in soft faux fur with a velour-covered plastic headband and glittery appliqués at the top.
Sleeveless top in a silk crêpe weave in a wide, gently flared style with a rounded hem.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Imitation leather card holder with four card compartments and one note compartment. Size 7x10 cm.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Dungaree dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps that join at the back. Metal fasteners on the straps, front pockets and press-studs at the sides.
Long coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and no buttons at the front. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Wide, calf-length dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit motif on the front, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a V-neck and draping at the front. Partly lined.
Court shoes in satin with a sheen. Round toes, an ankle strap with an adjustable fastening, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 5.5 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.

Blouse in airy, patterned crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back and gathers at the front of the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, wide dress in patterned satin with a deep V-neck, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, wrapover front and a seam with ties at the waist. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Jersey lining.
Vest tops in cotton jersey with trims around the neckline and armholes. Two vest tops are patterned.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket. Gently rounded hem at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports trousers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
All-in-one pyjamas in organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, chest pocket and press-studs down the front, at the crotch and down the insides of the legs.

Jumpsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck with a pleat at the top and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt below the tummy, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Baby Exclusive. Shirt in an organic cotton weave with buttons and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Short slits in the sides.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
